mapper.insert: insert into courseReview(id, content, course_id, teacher_id, student_id) values(CourseReviewIdSeq.nextval, #{content}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{studentId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id as id,r.content as content, r.created_at as createdAt, r.course_id as courseId, c.title as courseName, r.teacher_id as teacherId, r.student_id as studentId from coursereview r, course c where r.course_id = c.id and r.teacher_id = #{teacherId}
